extracted_information: The provided web content is a preview of an article titled 'Java Virtual Threads: Ultimate Guide to Project Loom (2025)'. It introduces Java Virtual Threads as part of Project Loom, highlighting their significance for interviews and modern Java development. The content differentiates between traditional Platform Threads and new Virtual Threads, emphasizing the latter's benefits for I/O-bound operations.

features.name: I/O work optimization
features.description: Virtual threads are ideal for I/O-bound tasks, addressing the issue of blocking I/O wasting threads.

features.name: CPU work guidance
features.description: For CPU-bound work, platform threads are still recommended.
